It's just good, daft fun. You're either swearing because you just missed skill check or swearing because someone just wriggled out of your grip, but either way you're swearing. Rounds aren't too long and no one's sore if they lose. Just go again!

I played this game on my friend computer when first DLC was out and to be honest it was the best game i ever played and it was scary with the killer being op but now its the survivors are op. its really annoying now, i love playing the killer but i have to camp people now when they are on a hook cause once they get off they heal and i never see them again(of course they message and say im being unfair yet they all have toolboxes or perks that make fixing a generator like a walk in the park even its the main goal and supposed to be hard) and when i played survivors it was scary knowing im screwed if im found like a real horror game or i don't want to be caught but hey i can juke, out run,take hits when ever i wont cause survivors are broken, totally lost the horror element now, i never seen a game go so far downhill in a year like this. and if the DEVS are reading this plz unnerf killer and unbuffs survivors this is supposed to be a horror game not a game tha'ts supposed to be get me mad like dark souls if i want a challenge then i play survivors not killers,if you bought this get a refund before you cant and if you cant just hit the uninstall button trust me it will save you.

Open mouth ,weak killers and shorts simulator.

I've played this game at least with one friend for all games in both public and custom matches. And I have to say I would never want to play it with only strangers unless I was the killer and even then not really. It is much more fun to play with friends especially if you can get a full party. The custom matches where everything is unlocked is so much better than the public games as well. Over all, I enjoy the variation of killers and the build potentials; but it is really only fun with friends where you are not in serious competition.

TL;DR If you want to play Solo this probably isn't for you if you don't like the grind. If you want to play with friends this game is great!
the gameplay is amazing! its fun to play, you get to make friends from it, its the best honestly
